CustomField.description: Returns true if any marketing options are ticked
CustomField.formula: OR(Marketing_AV__c = true, Marketing_Carpet__c = true, Marketing_Electrics__c = true, Marketing_Exhibitor_Manual__c = true, Marketing_Furniture__c = true, Marketing_Graphics__c = true, Marketing_Lead_Capture__c = true, Marketing_Logistics__c = true, Marketing_Nameboards__c = true, Marketing_Pavillion__c = true, Marketing_Registration__c = true, Marketing_Rigging__c = true, Marketing_Shell_Scheme__c = true, Marketing_Shell_Scheme_Extras__c = true, Marketing_Space_Only_Stands_Design_Build__c = true, Marketing_Sprinkler_Installation__c = true, Marketing_Stand_Approval_Testing__c = true, Marketing_Stand_Cleaning__c = true, Marketing_Stand_Security__c = true, Marketing_Telephone_and_Telefax__c = true, Marketing_Water__c = true, Marketing_Waste__c = true )
CustomField.label: Can Market
